entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:17 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
